channel.title: Hamachi Help,?
channel.description:
Um, yeah, i have just intstalled hamachi because apparently you need it to play some servers, the best ones, :P
but i dont get it. like what do you do and what do i need to play on that particular server??
can someone tell me wat to do exactly?

item.title: Hamachi Help,?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Click on the triangle on hamachi and select “join an existing network”. Put the network name and pass in there that you want to join. Put down the ip of the server and port, and you should be on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi Help,?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

join there server, copy the ip, and use it for the server ip

Read full topic
